p: Demographic and clinical characteristics of the patients reported by the surveillance network are presented in Table 1. Patients infected with DENV-4 serotype were significantly older (mean age 27.4 vs. 24.5, p < 0.0001) than patients infected with other DENV serotypes ( Table 1 and Figure 4). Sex ratio, days to diagnosis, and severity were no different for DENV-4 when compared to the other serotypes.
